name: Metalventure
description:
Metalventure is a game about a Metalhead. Story begins in some Metal Festival in the 80's, when the main character accidentally finds a portal that leads him to Hell. He needs to find a way out of there, but get out of Hell is not an easy task, the main character have to make a deal with Satan so that he can get out safely.. 

And as he begins His journey Through The Fire and Flames pass the Winter's Gate coursing through the River Styx into the pits of Hell where Satan lives. He meets with friends and companions that will help him fight alongside his way.

===============================================================

This is a prototype level of a game that me & myself currently working on. The story is as mentioned above . For now the assets that I'm using is a free assets, but it will be change in the future to match the scene and the story of the game.

There still a lot of things that needs to be fix, but the game is playable already.

If you want to try to play, download the file below and enjoy the game...

(I mean, find all the bugs inside the game)

Development might be a little slow since I have another job, but hopefully I'll be able to finish the game somewhere along this year.

And thank you for downloading and playing the game !!

Also, since it's a free game you can always delete it afterwards :D

Cheers, Bedroom Studio.
